per_frame_init_4=rtp=0;rtq=0;

per_frame_init_7=dcsp=0
per_frame_init_8=
per_frame_1=decay=1;
per_frame_2=zoom=0.95+.075*max(treb_att,mid_att+.5);
per_frame_3=zoom = max(1.0001,zoom);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=warp = 0;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=vol=(bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.25;
per_frame_8=vol=vol*vol;
per_frame_9=mtime=mtime+vol*0.1;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q1=mtime*0.4-.05*time;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=rot = max(bass_att,mid_att-.5) * .04;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`   float d = texsize.zw;
warp_4=`   float3 deltax = (GetPixel(uv + float2(1,0)*d) + GetPixel(uv + float2(1,0)*d))*0.5;    
warp_5=`   float3 deltay = (GetPixel(uv + float2(0,1)*d) + GetPixel(uv + float2(0,1)*d))*0.5;    
warp_6=`     
warp_7=`
warp_8=`   ret = ((deltax+deltay - tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.9 + 0.5 ))); 
warp_9=`   ret -= 0.4;
warp_10=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_5=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz, 
comp_6=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz, 
comp_7=`                0.50 
comp_8=`              ); //video echo
comp_9=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_10=`    float3 retish = 1 - ret*(1-ret)*4; //solarize
comp_11=`    ret = GetBlur3(uv)*2 + GetBlur3(uv_echo)*2 + ret;
comp_12=`}
